description: Shein and Temu follow TikTok in coming under scrutiny by US lawmakers. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Sino-US tensions: Fast fashion retailers like Shein, Temu come under attack
title_page: Sino-US tensions: Fast fashion retailers like Shein, Temu come under attack | The Straits Times
maintext:
WASHINGTON – On TikTok, there exists a whole genre of shopping “haul” posts, where Gen Z influencers try on clothing and other purchases, and tell followers whether they will keep or return the items.
The hauls, typically worth hundreds of dollars, can be ridiculously large – some videos show packages spilling out of the influencers’ arms or covering an entire bedroom floor.
